body.name: Sundwudu 4 Pack Biker Shorts for Women - 8” High Waist Tummy Control Summer Workout Shorts for Running Yoga Athletic
features: 【Get 4 for the Price of 3】 Our affordable women’s shorts has four pack, which can meet your different wear needs every day. These soft-to-the-touch shorts feature an all-over classic and printed hued fashion design featuring the solid color, leopard, and camo to match your style or personal look; these body-hugging high waist shorts will quickly become your favorite go-to.

【Soft as Sliky】Workout shorts are made from soft, breathable, comfort and smooth polyester and spandex blend, which is a very soft, lightweight, and breathable material to keep you cool and comfortable on the stickiest summer days. It is like a second skin giving you the naked sensation and unrestricted movement.

【High Waist & No Roll Down】 Women Yoga shorts using 5" tummy control waistband applied the most recent 4-way stretch, non-see-through fabric comfortable lies flat against your skin and won't roll down. It makes your waist look slimmer, perfect line cut foil hip, make hip look more.

【Fashion Daily Wear & Outfits】 These women's shorts are perfect for yoga, biking, volleyball, exercise, fitness, running, any type of workout, or everyday casual use. Grab a pair of short bike leggings for a day at the office, and pack a pair of shorts for happy hours. Add a pair of heels to both, and you have a perfect look. It can be worn then under dresses or skirts to prevent chub-rub. Our Yoga Shorts size fits slimmer, big, tall, petite, plus-size women.

【Easy Care & Customer Service】 After wearing biker Shorts, throw them into the washing machine to easily solve the laundry problem without taking up your time and energy; you can dry them and place them in drawers. Wash with like color. If you have any questions, pls contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Stretch, Opaque, Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I didn't expect a lot from these - so many items I buy that are marketed as soft and stretchy end up being too thin and too small. These are perfection! They are buttery soft and feel warm and cozy when I put them on. The waist and leg stitching are not too tight and stretch well with the fabric. I have been a little rough with these - I have washed and dried them and have not seen any damage so far. (I usually wash and then hang to dry just because I know heat and elasticity are not friends.) They've held up better than most similar products I've bought.For context, I wear these primarily under my dresses to prevent chub-rub - if you know what I mean. I've been wearing them more or less weekly for the last month+ and there's no pilling or holes. They look all but brand new, in fact. I can also wear them as pajamas and be very comfortable. They don't tend to bunch up on me and they don't stretch out while wearing them, so they are always a comfortable fit.Coming back in January 2024 to say: These are still holding up to regular wear and have not pilled, thinned, or ripped.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyday Perfection in a Pack!
reviews.reviewText: I've been wearing the Sundwudu Biker Shorts for a week now, and oh my, what a delightful experience! The high waist design keeps everything snug and in place, making them the perfect companion for my yoga and running sessions. But they're not just for workouts; they've effortlessly become my go-to for daily errands and summer outings. The pack of four means I always have a fresh pair ready, making my mornings a breeze.The material is soft yet durable, with just the right amount of stretch. And let's talk about the value – getting four quality shorts in one pack? Absolute steal! I'm so glad I found the Sundwudu Biker Shorts. They truly tick all the boxes for me and have made my summer wardrobe not only functional but fabulously chic. Definitely a 5-star worthy addition!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have bought so many biker shorts over the years, these are 100% the best I’ve ever purchased!! Amazing feel, great fit and they have pockets! The material is not too thin, and they have great tummy control. 5/5 ⭐️!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit see through but not terribly so
reviews.reviewText: They are very soft and comfortable, and a good deal (I got 4 for less than $20, but it seems they went up some in price).My only complaint with these shorts is that they are a bit see through. I went back and forth about purchasing these when I read the reviews because some said they are and others said they aren't. I'm a pretty harsh critic when it comes to testing transparency. I do a light check and a bend check. You could see my thong, but it wasn't obvious-in-your-face. The patterned shorts covered this better than the solid color ones. For me, any underwear visibility makes me self-conscious, especially when considering working out in them, so I was going to return these shorts. I missed the window on that unfortunately, but I'm not too upset because they're still totally wearable with a long shirt or in a cute outfit with a blazer—or even with just a regular outfit if you don't care as much as I do about them potentially being a bit see-through at certain angles/lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most Comfortable Biker Shorts Ever!
reviews.reviewText: These things are incredibly comfortable!! I could have bought either size but went with the M/L. The fabric is exactly like my LuLuLemn Align leggings (the lightest weight - designed for yoga). You honestly almost feel like you are wearing nothing. Very very comfortable. I've worn these shorts under sundresses (perfect) and at the gym (perfect) and to yoga class (perfect) and just around town (also perfect). It's been hot here, and I was concerned they would be sweaty and hot - nope, very comfortable and cool. You can wear them all day and be perfectly comfortable. The fabric is thin, but not see-through at all (just like the LuluLemon fabric). Very stretchy, but does not get baggy or saggy with wear. They absolutely stay in place while wearing -- no rolling at the waist, no creeping up in the legs. These things are SO awesome! They also wash beautifully (cold water, gentle cycle, Woolite, hang to dry). The only tiny negative is that the M/L goes way up on my stomach (maybe 5" above belly button), but they stay in place, and really are comfortable, so the super-high-height of the waistline doesn't bother me. Like I said, I probably could have gotten the S/M. Anyway - TRY THEM! I promise will love them too. I'm going to buy some as gifts for my girlfriends, they are that great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i’m 5’7 200lbsi bought L/XLmaterial is very soft and stretchyperfect shorts to hang out on a cruise

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Warning- Fabric bleeds color!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased as an Amazon recommendation and the shorts are soft, work great for exercising but wanted to warn people it bleeds color terribly. I washed them on cold with a few beach towels and the vibrant colored towels are muted by the color transfer. After washing the towels separately again it only managed to remove some of the tint. I air dried the shorts since I did not want more dye staining my dryer. Washing these are a bit of a bother because I do not want to stain my dryer or color transfer to other clothes. Purchased the size recommended by Amazon and it was a good fit. For reference I am 5’10” size 12 hourglass figure and the size L/XL fit comfortably and did not ride up. Shorts were not too short and provided coverage and length for spin class.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t ride up!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my cruise to Mexico. I was looking for biker shorts I could wear under dresses and alone and these worked great. They have deep pockets and are a very soft material. I did get a little hot in them but I was also in 100 degree heat. When wearing these under my dress in AC they aren’t hot. I ended up buying another set for my little sister and also recommended them to my friends. They don’t ride up when you walk and aren’t see through unless you bend over and move to the right light( they are only a little see thru then). All in all I would definitely recommend and will be buying more in the future. They are also tru to size as I wear a 3x jeans size 20-22 and the 3x fit perfectly
These are awesome shrts. They do not over stretch and wash really well. Good quality great price!
Love these shorts, would buy again

I bought these for a holiday to a warm climate. I was hoping to wear them for working out and having 4 would allow plenty of time between washing. I love them! The material is soft that when I’m just in the condo I will put them on for lounging after a day of sunshine. Not see through and not to thick …perfect for what I was looking for.
These are the best shorts ever! Comfy, soft, and thin. I wear them under my dresses all the time❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Did not get what I paid for
reviews.reviewText: I ordered Sundwudu 4 pack biker shorts and receive only three shorts. That's dishonesty
